full_summary: ================ **Government Tender Announcement** --- Title ----- RISO - Environmental site investigation services and Toxicological and ecotoxicological risk analyses --- ### Table of Contents * [Tender Details](#tenderDetails) * [Tender Description](#tenderDescription) * [Important Notice to Suppliers](#importantNotice) * [Contract Requirements](#contractRequirements) * [Delivery and Payment Terms](#deliveryPayment) --- ### Tender Details * **Tender Title:** RISO - Environmental site investigation services and Toxicological and ecotoxicological risk analyses * **Reference Number:** PW-_MTC-170-16500 * **Amendment Number:** 4 * **Solicitation Number:** EF928-212177/A * **Publication Date:** 2022-08-15 * **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-12T14:00:00 --- ### Tender Description The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested bidders to submit proposals for the provision of environmental site investigation services and toxicological and ecotoxicological risk analyses. The services required are detailed in Annex A - Statement of Work. The scope of work includes: * Environmental site investigation services for anywhere in Quebec, excluding stream 1A and 1B. * Toxicological and ecotoxicological risk analyses for anywhere in Quebec, excluding stream 2A and 2B. --- ### Important Notice to Suppliers Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, temporary measures are being taken to encourage social distancing on-site at the Québec Region Bid Receiving Unit. Suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application. --- ### Contract Requirements The contract period shall be two (2) firm years from the date of issuance of the Standing Offer, with the option to extend for three (3) additional one-year extension period. A separate, completed offer is required for each Stream. It is possible for Offerors to be a Joint-Venture. --- ### Delivery and Payment Terms The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Delivery date is above-mentioned.
